headline: Jim Cramer on GE Aerospace: “I Think That It’s Just a Long-Term Buy”
summary: GE Aerospace (NYSE:GE) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer put under the microscope. A caller asked Cramer what he thinks is going to happen with the company, and he replied: Well, there you got Larry Culp working for you. I think that it’s just a long-term buy.
